long.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
LiveNetworks, embeds enterprise messaging, live video and secure structured data exchange  within your workflow or favorited application.

From EMR systems such as Epic or Cerner,  or social networks such as LinkedIn and Facebook , or AI system such as chatGPT, you can empower these applications and turn them to a LiveNetwork securely and instantly  without any code modification.

WWW.LiveNetworks.ai
long.ca,de,es,fr,hi,id,it,ko,pl,pt_BR,pt_PT,r:
LiveNetworks, patent pending technology,  empowers any Electronic Medical Record system such as Epic or Cerner or social networks such as LinkedIn and Facebook with an instant Live Video conferencing , enterprise messaging without any code modification.

For example: using LiveNetworks you will be able,  with a push of a button, to hold live video (or audio) with other members of LinkedIn , as an example, schedule a an office or online meeting, collect administration and or clinical data data using forms, requests for services, payments and signatures and much more,  all, without ever leaving  your application or workflow.

Works on on any secure web page and application


LiveNetworks can be used as portal from your site or any  site or for enterprise messaging with your patients or customers, staff and and peers.

WWW.LiveNetworks.ai
